messages.title: Because people like you voted Labour...
messages.content: Our children have had a better start in life because of SureStart.

messages.title: ...we've been able to make a difference.
messages.content: We've helped people keep their homes, helped jobs and businesses, put people first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The recession has been difficult for many people. We were determined to help people stay in their homes. The Tories would have done nothing.
The NHS, pre-school and SureStart, tax credits, and extra help for pensioners. That's Labour - the Tories want a tax cut for the rich.

issues.health: The NHS, pre-school and SureStart, tax credits, and extra help for pensioners.
issues.socialWelfare: Tax credits, and extra help for pensioners.

housing.content: The recession has been difficult for many people. We were determined to help people stay in their homes. The Tories would have done nothing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived, worked and brought up my children in Southampton. What happens here matters to me as it does to every local family.

politicalExperience.achievements: Been able to make a real difference in the city.
